meanings.definition: Plants that prefer acidic soil and are intolerant of lime.
meanings.sent1: Calcifuges like to grow in soil that is not too chalky.
meanings.sent2: The calcifuges in my garden thrive in the acidic environment.
meanings.sent3: The calcifuges in the yard threw a party when the soil turned more acidic.
meanings.sent4: The calcifuges stood out like rebels in the lime-dominated garden.
meanings.sent5: I remember the calcifuges by picturing them as the acid-loving rebels of the plant world.

meanings.definition: A substance that inhibits the growth of plants by reducing the availability of calcium in the soil.
meanings.sent1: The calcifuges were used to control plant growth by limiting calcium.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use calcifuges to prevent certain plants from growing.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous calcifuges played a prank on the plants by hiding all the calcium.
meanings.sent4: Calcifuges act like plant growth police, restricting calcium access.
meanings.sent5: The calcifuges worked like plant growth stop signs, halting any calcium from reaching the roots.
